idea:
We at RED BOX COMMUNICATION (formerly known as M/s. Maiya Advertising) are promoters of communication channels between various government bodies & local public. We as a progressive advertising agency work closely with SME’s and Government departments. Our core objective in the company is to establish a direct and clear channel of dialoguebetween the Government and its Citizens.
We have successfully executed similar concept for almost a decade between years 1996 to 2005 in tandem with the Western, Central & Harbor railways with involvement of Railway Police Force. The project was very well appreciated as it helped in effectively bridging the gap between the authorities and the common man.
In our new initiative aligning our objective, we hereby present the unique concept of 'Display Notice Board ' which provides information which should keep people update regarding new rules, amendments & lots of other information from various government bodies.
name: RED BOX COMMUNICATION

idea:
We AJAYA SOLUTION PVT LTD come up with mobile app / platform by the brand name RupeeMax.
RupeeMax is a convenient online loan app without mortgages. It focuses on helping young white-collar workers and blue-collar workers to meet their urgent needs of petty loan in their daily life with providing a smart loan which is range from 5,000 Rupees to 10,000 Rupees and 15 days’ loan tenure.
RupeeMax adopts the online way, which eliminates the tedious processes and applications of the traditional financial services.It is aiming to provide a new mode of borrowing with simple, convenient, flexible and fast.
RupeeMax is only a service provider and aggregating mobile app / platform and does not do any type of lending.
name: Ajaya Solutions Private Limited

idea:
SpecInn is an Indian Brand which means in itself a great combination of colours with an Innovative type design. Launched in 2019, we are here to deliver most of the amazing lifestyle products but with a colour of your choice. The label innovates on new designs. The Brand stands for imaginative collaborations.
SpecInn Pvt Ltd is the company which is going to provide Customisation of Shoes (Sneakers, Canvas, Casuals) to their customers and many other products in the coming future
Our motto is very simple as we are going to fulfil every customers need based on their requirements. SpecInn is coming with a very different idea/innovation in the market to satisfy what customer wants in their daily lifestyle
name: SPECINN PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We write and curate news based on technology from the internet. Our magazine which is produced weekly contains all our works. Our writers write articles and short explainers based on the latest tech advances in words that a non-tech enthusiast person would easily understand.
name: Omega Media Group

idea:
We are a team of talented engineers who are on a mission to help businesses grow and make them more efficient with the help of Digital Transformation, Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning and Intuitive User Experience.
We have worked on a variety of areas in data science ranging from Predictive modelling, Text analytics, Chatbots, Image processing, Data analytics, Credit Risk Profiling, Propensity Modelling, Customer Lifetime value, Customer profiling and so on.
name: Pixeldust Technologies

idea: In Manufacturing Industry-specially in Plastic injection Mould manufacturing required huge set up and initial investment for starting Tool room which consist of VMC,wire cut,Edm and all conventional set up....where we want start with interlinking wiith all the job work vmc people along with expert in particular field to be introduced & get the work with Quality and on time delivery.
name: MAPEL MOULDS AND DIES INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Based in Maharashtra, we, Belt Centre(MUMBAI), are one of the renowned manufacturers, traders, importers and distributors of a wide range of Conveyor Belts. Our product range comprises V Belts, PU Conveyor Belts, Industrial V Belts, Transmission Belts, Conveyor Belts, Timing Belts, Poly V Belts, Variable Speed Belts, TFO Belts, etc. Each of these products is made of advanced technologies and high-grade materials. Some of our products are also procured from the authorized and leading manufacturers. And so, they are second to none in terms of quality and availed in bulk quantity by several industries. Customers appreciate our products for their high performance, durability, strong rust resistance, economical prices and low maintenance. Moreover, we offer our products in various technical specifications that suit the customer's exact needs
name: BELT CENTRE MUMBAI

idea:
WSS is a digital company providing solutions in form of the best services and sustainable products based on the latest technology and market trends.

With our services, we digitally empower businesses all around the world to cope with different aspects of operations dealing with website design and development, mobile app development, digital marketing, AI & ML solutions, blockchain-based applications, and branding. On the other hand, we fill in market gaps and needs with our smart products using the latest technologies and best designs.
name: WHARF STREET STRATEGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Redbook is connecting the pharma supply chain via its context-aware predictive analytics enabled technology
offering. It simplifies several trivial issues for chemists and distributors using its AI-driven algorithms. Reduced dependency on the human ability to learn and adapt to new systems by automating over a dozen business processes
unlocks value for drug manufacturers and creates new revenue opportunities for retail/online chemists.
name: INSTINCT INNOVATIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We are up-coming company dedicated to Interior, Civil & Fabrication Turnkey Work, taking into consideration the growing Life Styles and Demands of the Industry in India.
name: INTERIOR & TURNKEY PROJECTS
